name: BlocKombat
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: BlocKombat is a P2E (play to earn) 3D multichain, GameFi ecosystem with NFTs rewards with the aim of revolutionizing the GameFi industry and further drive the adoption of crypto and play to earn in the gaming industry.
